title: ** Login to the Secure Area
preconditions: User has a valid username and password
main_flow: User navigates to the login page at https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/login
5. If credentials are valid, system displays a success message and user is redirected to the secure area
6. If credentials are invalid, system displays an error message
If the user forgets their password, they can click on "Forgot password" and follow the steps to reset their password.
If the user's account is locked due to too many failed login attempts, they will need to wait for a certain amount of time before they can try logging in again.
postconditions: User is logged into the secure area
User can access the features and functionality of the secure area
